p: may be granted, directed to the Sum Lewis V Wycoff Sheriff as aforesaid, commanding him to have the bodies of your petitioners before your honor, at a time and plase therein to be spesified to do and resieve what shall then and there considered by your honor, cencerning your petitioners, together with the time and cause of his detention and said writ, and that your petitioners maya be restored to their liberty,
Peter Nelson W Smith H Elsner C Whaley G. Mattson Chalrs Lundblad Dennis his X mark Coffrey
